detaileddescription.para: Electric field types are used in the electric field interface (E_field.c) to direct function calls to correct electric field instances. Each electric field instance must have a corresponding type.
Electric field types are used in the electric field interface (E_field.c) to direct function calls to correct electric field instances. Each electric field instance must have a corresponding type.

briefdescription.para: Load electric field data and prepare parameters.

detaileddescription.para: This function fills the relevant electric field offload struct with parameters and allocates and fills the offload array.
The offload data has to have a type when this function is called as it should be set when the offload data is constructed from inputs.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to pointer to offload array

briefdescription.para: Free offload array and reset parameters.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to pointer to offload array

briefdescription.para: Initialize electric field data struct on target.

detaileddescription.para: This function copies the electric field parameters from the offload struct to the struct on target and sets the electric field data pointers to correct offsets in the offload array.
This function returns error if the offload data has not been initialized. The instances themselves should not return an error since all they do is assign pointers and values.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to data struct on target

simplesect.para: Non-zero integer if offload was not initialized beforehand

memberdef.argsstring: (real E[3], real r, real phi, real z, real t, E_field_data *Edata, B_field_data *Bdata)
memberdef.name: E_field_eval_E

detaileddescription.para: This function evaluates the electric field at the given coordinates. Note that magnetic field data is also required in case electric field is e.g. a flux quantity.
The values are stored in the given array as:

parameterdescription.para: pointer to array where electric field values are stored
pointer to electric field data struct
pointer to magnetic field data struct

simplesect.para: Non-zero a5err value if evaluation failed, zero otherwise

detaileddescription.para: Contains a list declaring all E_field_types, and declaration of E_field_offload_data and E_field_data structs.
